entry.title: Sonic Superstars Is A Modernized 2D Adventure With Four-Player Co-Op
entry.summary: Sega and Sonic Team have announced Sonic Superstars, a new 2D adventure starring the company's Blue Blur. Though Sonic is the star, as the name implies, there are plenty of supporting cast members. In this reveal trailer, we also see Tails, Knuckles, and Amy appear as playable characters, each with their own unique abilities. For the first time since Sonic Adventure, original Sonic the Hedgehog designer and artist Naoto Ohshima returns to the franchise. As the original designer of the Sonic the Hedgehog and Dr. Eggman characters, he will bring an all-new character to the franchise through Sonic Superstars. Sonic Superstars also introduces seven different Emerald Powers. In the trailer, we see Sonic create clones of himself and climb waterfalls, but the press release also teases "powering up." Taking place on the North Star Islands, Sonic Superstars purports to deliver never-before-seen environments, hinting that, despite the compilation-style name, we will be speeding through all new levels instead of the usual suspects like Green Hill and Chemical Plant. The press release teases enormous creatures and evil plans from Dr. Eggman, while Fang the Sniper (AKA Nack the Weasel) from Sonic Triple Trouble, Sonic the Fighters, and other games seems to appear as a secondary enemy. In the trailer, we also see what look to be Special Stages that borrow from the rotating Special Stages from Sonic 1, plus a 3D Special Stage. The modernized HD graphics look great in motion, but the proof will be in how it plays, particularly following how disappointed many in the community were by Sonic the Hedgehog 4. If Sonic Team is able to nail the physics, momentum, and overall feel, Sonic Superstars could do for the 2D Sonic series what New Super Mario Bros. did for the 2D Mario series. Sonic Superstars releases both digitally and physically for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC this fall, and will start at $60.

entry.title: Lies Of P Is Releasing In September And Getting A Free Demo Today
entry.summary:
Lies of P, a game that is somehow inspired by Bloodborne and the 1883 Italian novel, The Adventures of Pinocchio, is getting a playable demo and it will be available today on all platforms the game is releasing for.
Along with the news of the demo, the game also received a new trailer, a collection of new screenshots (seen below), and the reveal of a collector's edition for the game. The deluxe version of the game will include the Great Venigni’s Set, a unique mask, and three days early access to the game. The physical collector's edition will include a steelbook, artbook, and a digital soundtrack. The demo, which will be available today, let's players check out the game's first two chapters, which will let players tackle a boss alongside introducing a number of characters.
Lies of P releases September 19 on PlayStation 5 and 4, Xbox Series X/S and Xbox One, and PC.

entry.title: Journey Now Into an Age of Chivalry in an Alternate Reality
entry.summary: A stalwart party exploring the unknown, seeking the fabled Inner Sanctum. But all is not what it seems in the world of Varn... The ScummVM Team is pleased to announce full support for the PC version of the first game of the Might and Magic series: Might and Magic Book One: The Secret of the Inner Sanctum. Two modes are supported: The original look and feel of the game (sound, which in the original consisted of merely the occasional beep, is not supported) A ScummVM-exclusive enhanced mode, which uses the interface of the later Xeen games, including niceties such as better character screens, automapping, and sound effects. It also integrates the impressive "Might and Magic 1 Graphics Overhaul Mod", which provides better in-game map and monster graphics. The xeen.cc file is required from Might and Magic: IV or Might and Magic: World of Xeen. Both modes allow saving your game anywhere outside of combat via the ScummVM Global Main Menu (unlike the original game that only saved a single roster when checking into an inn). So make sure you save regularly, just in case you encounter problems. Help us test both game modes by grabbing a daily build and adding mm.dat to the same folder as your game files. Read through our testing guidelines, and please take some screenshots along the way. Now, go forth, and discover the true secrets of the game that started the long running epic fantasy series! >

This article is seeing how for Mesa Git the performance of Zink on the RADV Vulkan driver compares to that of the native RadeonSI driver while testing with both the Radeon RX 7600 and RX 7900 XTX graphics cards.

entry.title: Rightscorp Taps Indie Labels to Fuel New Wave of Piracy Settlement Action
entry.summary: After somehow managing to survive years of losses that pushed the company ever closer to bankruptcy, Rightscorp's piracy settlement model suddenly underpinned recording industry lawsuits against ISPs in the United States. After joining the American Association of Independent Music (A2IM), Rightscorp hopes that the Indie sector will reinvigorate its fortunes. From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.

entry.title: Firewally Zyxel mají aktuálně zneužívané díry, nutno okamžitě záplatovat
entry.summary: Americká Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA) v pondělí informovala o dvou známých zranitelnostech firewallů Zyxel, které jsou obě aktivně zneužívány útočníky. Dostaly označení CVE-2023–33009 a CVE-2023–33010 a jde jako často o zranitelnosti typu buffer overflow, kdy útočník může dostat zařízení DoS útokem a následně na něm spouštět škodlivý kód.

entry.title: Apple definitivně skoncoval s x86, stroje s M2 Ultra nesou až 24 CPU jader a 192 GB LPDDR5
entry.summary: Dle očekávání Apple završuje svůj přechod od architektury x86 a procesorů Intel Core / Xeon na vlastní čipy architektury ARM. Na trh míří nové stroje Apple nesoucí největší čipy rodiny M2, včetně modelu Ultra s až 24 CPU jádry, až 76 GPU jádry (9728 shader jednotek), 32 jádry pro AI výpočty a podporou až 192GB unifikované paměti s propustností 800 GB/s. To vše v celku zvícím 134 miliard tranzistorů ve dvou spojených čipech M2 Max.

entry.title: OnlyTrains: for fans of trains, and only trains
entry.summary: Trainbot uses a Raspberry Pi camera to watch a piece of train track, detect trains, and stitch together images of them. The post OnlyTrains: for fans of trains, and only trains appeared first on Raspberry Pi.

entry.title: HDMI kabely: K čemu slouží?
entry.summary: HDMI (High-Definition Multimedia Interface) kabely jsou dnes běžně používaným propojovacím prvkem pro přenos obrazu a zvuku ve vysokém rozlišení. Tyto kabely jsou často spojovány s televizory a počítačovými monitory, ale jejich využití není omezeno pouze jen na tyto zařízení.

entry.title: Kam mizí adresáře /bin, /sbin a /lib a proč už je nepotřebujeme?
entry.summary: Základní struktura adresářů v unixových systémech je tu s námi od začátku sedmdesátých let, tedy vlastně asi půl století. Některé zvláštní vztahy ale vznikly spíš náhodou a po letech se začínají měnit.

entry.title: Programujeme zvuky a hudbu na ZX Spectru
entry.summary: Cesta, která vedla od prvních reproduktorů k dnešním výkonným zvukovým čipům umožňujícím tvorbu prostorových několikakanálových zvuků a hudby založené na wavetable syntéze, byla poměrně dlouhá a především zajímavá.

entry.title: IceWM 3.4 vylepšuje možnosti přiřazení kláves
entry.summary: Relativně nevýrazná je nová dílčí verze desktopu IceWM. Vydání 3.4.0 vylepšuje vlastně jen keybindings, kdy přibyla podpora pro použití kláves se Shiftem, znaky Latin-1 a všechny kódové body ze sady UTF-8. IceWM 3.4 také podporuje reparsování zkratek při změně rozložení klávesnice a přidává aktualizaci manuálu a různé menší opravy.

entry.title: Setback for Bell Canada in $400m Movie Piracy Lawsuit
entry.summary: Canada's 'Notice and Notice' regime requires ISPs to forward infringement notices to subscribers, typically those linked to the sharing of movies via BitTorrent. U.S. movie companies say that since Bell Canada failed to forward around 40,000 notices, they are now entitled to CAD$400m in damages. Bell's response included allegations of copyright misuse, abuse of process, champerty and maintenance and unlawful means conspiracy. That hasn't gone according to plan. From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.

entry.title: Obsah generovaný AI by měl být označený, říká Věra Jourová z Evropské komise
entry.summary: Místopředsedkyně Evropské komise pro hodnoty a transparentnost Věra Jourová dnes řekla, že by obsah generovaný umělou inteligencí měl být označený. Je to kvůli obavám ze zneužití AI k vytváření dezinformací.

entry.title: Virtuální Bastlírna vol. 27: vysokofrekvenční bastlení
entry.summary: Chystá se poslední jarní Virtuální Bastlírna. Nachystejte si ledové kávy, mojita a vodní chladiče a pojďte se se strahovskými bastlíři pobavit o technice a bastlení!

entry.title: Japan’s Largest Manga Piracy Site Shuts Down Following Cloudflare Probe
entry.summary: Japan's largest manga piracy site 13DL is no more. The site closed its doors shortly after a DMCA subpoena required CDN provider Cloudflare to uncover the identity of the site's operator. Anti-piracy group CODA says that Cloudflare has yet to hand over the information but, together with publishers and 'ethical hackers', the group will do everything in its power to hold the site owner responsible. From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.

entry.title: Meet Brian Corteil: CamJam event runner
entry.summary: The new event runner for CamJam is an old face in the community. This #MagPiMonday, we get to know him a little better. The post Meet Brian Corteil: CamJam event runner appeared first on Raspberry Pi.

entry.title: Marble Run
Top 10 Most Pirated Movies of The Week – 06/05/2023
entry.summary: Every week we take a close look at the most pirated movies on torrent sites. What are pirates downloading? 'John Wick: Chapter 4' tops the chart, followed by 'Hypnotic'. ‘The Super Mario Bros. Movie' completes the top three. From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.

entry.title: Týden na ITBiz: Soumrak nad Googlem? Analytici a trhy se neshodnou
entry.summary: Red Hat urychluje zavádění generativní AI v hybridním cloudu. Germanen jako cesta k energeticky úsporné elektronice?. Firmy v ČR se připravují k přechodu na novou generaci řešení SAP. Studie Cisco: přechod firem do multicloudu přináší problémy se zabezpečením přístupu uživatelů. Půl roku od uvedení ChatGPT: Umělá inteligence v centru zájmu. Soumrak nad Googlem? Analytici a trhy se neshodnou.

entry.title: High Prices Make Textbook ‘Piracy’ Acceptable to Most Students
entry.summary: Through several lawsuits, Danish publishers tried to send a clear message: educating oneself through pirated textbooks is illegal. This message has thus far failed to make an impact. New research published by the Rights Alliance shows that more than half of all students find it acceptable to use pirated books. Prison threats are not much of a deterrent but they are willing to change if prices drop significantly. From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.

entry.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Kondenzátory na bázi polysulfátů
entry.summary: Co si Hawkingův spolupracovník Hertog myslí o původu času. Zachytili vzácný rozpad Higgsova bosonu. Za posledních 5 milionů let se magnetické pole Země přepólovalo 7krát. Exoplanety u červených trpaslíků. Vědci v ČR získali nejpokročilejší systém pro umělou inteligenci.

entry.title: Bulgarian ISPs Will Block Pirate Bay & Zamunda, But Not Before a Fight
entry.summary: Early 2020 the Bulgarian Association of Music Producers (BAMP) and IFPI launched legal action to compel local ISPs to block The Pirate Bay and Zamunda, Bulgaria's most-visited pirate site. This week a Bulgarian court ordered local ISPs to block both sites, including all mirrors and proxies. The music groups say they're pleased with the outcome but the details suggest that local ISPs were against the process right from the beginning. From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.

entry.title: Událo se v týdnu 22/2023
entry.summary: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.

entry.title: Music Pirates are Not Terrorists, Record Labels Argue in Court
entry.summary: Internet provider Cox Communications wants a court of appeal to reverse the $1 billion piracy liability verdict, handed down by a jury four years ago. As supplemental evidence, the ISP submitted a recent Supreme Court ruling which found Twitter not liable for aiding and abetting terrorism. The letter prompted a response from the music companies stressing that terrorism and piracy are quite different. From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.

entry.title: Controversial Pirate IPTV Supplier Investigated After Bell Complaint
entry.summary: Following reports of a complaint by Bell and other media companies, several searches were carried out in Canada this week as part of a TV piracy and money laundering investigation. Known locally as the Quebec Hugh Hefner, the alleged owner of a targeted IPTV service was previously sentenced in the U.S. after the DEA swapped 10kgs of cocaine found in a computer, with another white powder worth considerably less. From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.

entry.title: This massive nose sniffs things then prints a description of the smell
entry.summary: This giant Raspberry Pi-powered nose sculpture prints a description out of its nostril of what it has just smelled. The post This massive nose sniffs things then prints a description of the smell appeared first on Raspberry Pi.

entry.title: Drainage Basins
RARBG Shutdown is a Major Blow to the Pirate Ecosystem
entry.summary: The surprise shutdown of torrent site RARBG and its tracker came as a shock to millions of users and the knock-on effects are already being felt elsewhere in the piracy ecosystem. Other torrent sites are seeing a slowdown in fresh content, automated download apps are starting to throw up errors, and many of the largest streaming sites are missing a key source of content. From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.

entry.title: Super prodej: Za doživotní licenci Windows 10 od Goodoffer24 jen €12 s možností upgradu na Windows 11, Office jen za €23 a mnoho dalšího
entry.summary: Supernabídka od Goodoffer24 také v červnu. Nejzajímavější je určitě doživotní licence na Windows 10 za pouhých €12, kde zároveň připomínáme, že vám dovoluje zdarma upgradovat na Windows 11! Garantujeme 30denní záruku na nákup s možností výměny licence v případě, že by se vyskytnul nějaký problém. Také potvrzujeme excelentní nabídky na balíky Office, kdy můžete ve verzi 2016 koupit doživotní licenci jen za €23!

entry.title: Paragraphica creates “photos” based on your location
entry.summary: Paragraphica is a camera that creates AI-generated "photos" using your location data. We spotted this on Twitter yesterday, loved it, saw it explode, then were delighted to learn it's powered by Raspberry Pi. The post Paragraphica creates “photos” based on your location appeared first on Raspberry Pi.

entry.title: Dragonfly Spectral Line Mapper
entry.summary: Seery Chen, a student at the University of Toronto, got in touch about their Raspberry Pi-powered PhD thesis project: a telescope called the Dragonfly Spectral Line Mapper. The post Dragonfly Spectral Line Mapper appeared first on Raspberry Pi.

entry.title: Distribuční novinky 17-21/2023
entry.summary: Firma VMware po roce vydala nový Photon OS. Vyšel čtvrtletní Alpine Linux. Red Hat aktualizoval Enterprise Linux 8 a 9, následovaly je alternativní sestavení. Nové obrazy systému dostal Debian a řada distribucí na něm založených: Clonezilla Live, Q4OS, Raspberry Pi OS, OSMC, Tails. Desktopové edice openSUSE MicroOS byly přejmenovány.

entry.title: Refurbished vending machine
entry.summary: A tech fan’s plan to give something back to his community led to a Raspberry Pi-based dispenser. The post Refurbished vending machine appeared first on Raspberry Pi.

entry.title: Týden na ITBiz: České firmy v krizi urychlují digitalizaci
entry.summary: Acer představuje nový Swift Edge 16 s procesory AMD Ryzen řady 7040. České firmy v krizi urychlují digitalizaci. 93 % ransomwarových útoků se zaměřuje na zálohovací úložiště a vynucuje si tím zaplacení výkupného. Moderní řešení pro datacentra od Schneider Electric. CyberSecurity Podcast ProID #11: Obnova organizace po ransomware útoku. Míra zašifrování dat ransomwarem dosáhla nejvyšší úrovně za poslední 4 roky. Se společností AddAI o AI a chatbotech. Dell představuje nejnovější zařízení pro hybridní práci.

entry.title: There's that name again. Matia. What's going on here?
entry.summary: Schizm: Mysterious Journey, the second supported game of the V-Cruise engine, is ready for public testing! Created in 2001 by Detalion and published by LK Avalon, this acclaimed 3D-rendered panoramic first-person adventure has you puzzle your way through an alien world as a team of two scientists split up when their ship crash-landed on the planet. ScummVM currently supports the DVD and digital English releases (with subtitles in Dutch, English, French, German, Italian, Polish, Spanish, Greek, and Russian). If you’re aware of any other versions, please contact us. To play any of these supported releases, you will need a daily development build. If you encounter any issues, please submit them to the issue tracker! >
